pages.title: The First Page
pages.text: You find yourself in a tunnel that ends in an intersection. You can either go right or left. Which way do you go?

pages.title: none
pages.text: The left branch of the tunnel ends in a solid wall.

pages.title: none
pages.text: You take the right branch of the tunnel. The ground opens up beneath you and you fall into a pit of spikes. RIP.
